column4: so- pretty random question. there's a self-extracting winRAR file in a form of an .exe. how would i open it?... wine didnt work right but i may have misconfigured it
apt-get install rar; rar x file
so I just do rar and the name of the file?
ya, but you need to give it a command and that's x, so "rar x <file>"
